@coinbase/onchainkit.why: Base-first UI components and helpers for onchain-enabled applications.

@coinbase/smart-wallet.why: Account abstraction and smart wallet interaction flows.

@coinbase/x402.why: HTTP-native x402 payment flow for gated or payable APIs.

@coinbase/cdp-sdk.why: SDK for interacting with Coinbase Developer Platform services.

@coinbase/agentkit.why: Toolkit for agent-based and automated onchain interactions.
